main.description: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer, Sr. NetSuite Administrator and Jr. Salesforce Administrator.
main.bio: Iâ€™m a self-taught Software Engineer with a growing interest in technology and the most effective methods of building sustainable, consistent and professional software. For over 12 years, I have been working in businesses across different industries. I've had the opportunity to hold positions in administration and primarily customer service. I'm passionate about coding and I enjoy new challenges.
main.contactmessage: Contact me for more or let's get together for coffee in DFW.
